product_name: L’Oréal Paris Revitalift Skincare Routine Kit
description: A simple skincare routine designed for busy lifestyles—helps maintain a fresh, confident look with minimal steps.

faqs.is_it_for_sensitive_skin: Patch-test first if you have sensitive skin.
faqs.when_to_use: Use daily—day products in the morning, night products before bed.
faqs.how_long_until_results: Visible improvements may appear after a few weeks of consistent use.
faqs.can_it_be_used_with_makeup: Yes, it works well under makeup.
faqs.is_it_a_full_routine: Yes, it is designed as a simple daily skincare routine.
